mapper.insert: insert into customer (Cu_ID, customer_Name, customer_Psd, customer_sex, Brithday, tel, Comments) values (#{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update customer set customer_Name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_Psd = #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_sex = #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Cu_ID = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select Cu_ID, customer_Name, customer_Psd, customer_sex, Brithday, tel, Comments from customer
